Title: Virtue of the Vicious
Writer: Gerry Conway (based on the Marvel comics by), John Romita Sr. (based on the Marvel comics by), Ross Andru (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Lightfoot (created by), Ken Kristensen, Angela LaManna (story editor), Ken Kristensen (staff writer)
Actors: Jon Bernthal, Ben Barnes, Amber Rose Revah, Daniel Webber
Plot: An attack on a high-profile politician is examined (and reexamined) through different perspectives. Madani faces a painful truth.
